  mutate(date = "x")

mask <- "Data/shp/Site_mask_Maxime.shp" %>%
  vect()

for (i in mask$site) {
  
  shp <- mask[which(site == i),]
  
  for(ii in 1:nrow(img_list)){
    img <- rast(img_list$path[ii]) %>% 
      mask(shp)
    
    df <- img %>% 
      as.data.frame(xy = T) %>%
      dplyr::filter(!is.na(???))
      mutate(date = img_list$date[ii],
             site = i)
  }
}
